list.name: PUSH-IT
list.description: All enemy Brawlers hit by Colette's charge are carried to the farthest point of the attack!
list.descriptionHtml: All enemy Brawlers hit by Colette's charge are carried to the farthest point of the attack!

list.name: MASS-TAX
list.description: Colette's Super gives her a x% shield for x seconds. Every enemy Brawler hit by it will add x% more protection.
list.descriptionHtml: Colette's Super gives her a x% shield for x seconds. Every enemy Brawler hit by it will add x% more protection.
